Posts.Content: Hi All, I woke up a couple of days ago with swollen lips (not quite Angelina Jolie, sadly!). I've been to the hospital and they can't figure it out... I'm having a break week between rounds 1 and 2. Has anyone else experienced anything like this and how long did it take to go away? I'm taking Piriton. Thank you x
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction??
